name: Poorman Computational Tool
description: Unit conversion, symbolic algebra, matrix operations, and computational math via mathjs and nerdamer, with optional SymPy bridge for advanced operations including step-by-step solutions and plot generation.
author: notaclaw

configuration.label: Python 3 Path
configuration.description: Path to the Python 3 interpreter for SymPy operations.

configuration.label: SymPy Timeout (ms)
configuration.description: Maximum time in milliseconds for SymPy computations.

configuration.label: Nerdamer Timeout (ms)
configuration.description: Maximum time in milliseconds for nerdamer worker computations.

configuration.label: Enable Result Cache
configuration.description: Cache computation results to avoid redundant calculations.

configuration.label: Default Output Format
configuration.description: Default output format for computation results.

configuration.label: Persistent Python Process
configuration.description: Keep a persistent Python process running for faster SymPy operations.

tools.name: compute
tools.description: Evaluate math expressions: unit conversions, symbolic algebra, arithmetic, expand, factor, simplify. Supports text and LaTeX output formats.

format.description: Output format: text, latex, or all.

tools.name: sympy_compute
tools.description: Evaluate advanced symbolic math via SymPy. Supports integrals, derivatives, differential equations, series, step-by-step solutions, and plot generation.

plot.description: Generate a plot as base64 PNG.

tools.name: matrix_compute
tools.description: Matrix and linear algebra operations: determinant, inverse, transpose, eigenvalues, rank.

tools.name: compute_cache_stats
tools.description: Get cache statistics or clear the computation cache.
